1323810.name: VELUCITY - O2JAM Pack 1
1323810.description:
Meet O2Jam's songs at VELUCITY.
You can see about 20 selected O2Jam songs in a VELUCITY exclusive pattern.

List of songs provided

  • 1. ASHITA NO ASHIOTO | Composed by makou
  • 2. Black Dragon | Composed by Memme
  • 3. Cross Time | Composed by Brandy
  • 4. Ever + More | Composed by Max
  • 5. Hyperion | Composed by M2U
  • 6. Jump To Summer | Composed by M2U
  • 7. Polaris | Composed by HiTaZ
  • 8. Revival on | Composed by Warak
  • 9. Super Stylin' | Composed by Warak
  • 10. Temptation | Composed by M2U
  • 11. The Power Of Light | Composed by Max
  • 12. The Queen | Composed by M2U
  • 13. V3 | Composed by BeautifulDay
  • 14. Visual Dream | Composed by Brandy
  • 15. 바람의 날개 | Composed by FE
  • 16. 비행 | Composed by Warak
  • 17. 애인을 내려주세요 | Composed by Warak
  • 18. 유령의 축제 Part 2 | Composed by Brandy
  • 19. 이루어지지 않는 건 | Composed by Warak
  • 20. 철거예정 | Composed by Warak
1323810.supported_languages: 英语, 日语, 韩语
